method.name: GET
method.doc: This API provides the default cluster identifier. The default cluster identifier is the IP address that is selected when joining a cluster without specifying a cluster identifier. The returned IP address is the first statically configured management IP address. Prior to ISAM 9.0.4.0, the cluster identifier could not be manually specified and the default cluster identifier was always used.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: The request was successful. The default cluster identifier was returned.

param.name: address
param.doc: The address that will be used as the default cluster identifier.
